website_summaries.verdict: Excellent load rating of 4,500 pounds and synthetic rope in a good value package.
pros: Designed for ATVs but has the capacity for all kinds of lifting tasks
Durable sealed 12-volt motor works when submerged
Wireless remotes for working at distance

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far would probably buy another
customer_reviews.text: So far so good used twice for lite pulls. Can't really beat it for the money two remotes all the hardware I ordered a different mount plate for it this is a 2019 rzr turbo update to 5 stars now used it alot here lately with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing winch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to install on my wife's 2008 Arctic Cat Wildcat sport. It bolted right up to the factory holes, and the remote controls work even better than I anticipated. The winch is very quiet. I would buy it again in a heartbeat. My only complaint is that I wish the wires that come with it we're about 2 ft longer each which is the only reason I gave it four stars. Otherwise, five stars all day
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Wrongly color coded!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2009 Polaris RZR, pain in the butt to put in that machine. The color coded connections are WRONG. The battery connections on the solenoid box are backwards! I have pictures, I connected everything correctly, when connecting to the battery, SPARKS! I haven't been able to use it yet, hopefully I didn't fry anything.. I have used it a few times now, works great! Just be careful when wiring it!
customer_reviews.author: michael.MM

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Remotes have dead batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Went together well. I had to make different power leads b/c they were too short. The biggest disappointment was both remotes have dead batteries 🔋. Moved a large downed tree. Batteries are 23a, if you want to be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: DarinGlover2009

customer_reviews.title: i love it but i ordered by mistake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by mistake and i'll have to return it. I wanted it for the jeep wrangler and doesn't worked for my jeep, but I gave 5 stars for quality, packaging and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Caspen

customer_reviews.title: Install mounts are not stellar
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this to a superatv bumper. Getting the bolt through the plate wasnt fun, the nut slides around in a pocket instead of being made into the mount bracket itself. I replaced the factory switch with my own toggle. Remotes worked as expected. Ive not had it long enough to comment on longevity
customer_reviews.author: JHoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best in low cost winch category.
customer_reviews.text: This winch is a beast. Way more power than needed to winch out my 4 seat Polaris RZR from the most difficult predicaments on the trail. Excellent quality components. It is a Chinese winch but is better built than the other cheap winches. Comes with 2 wireless remotes and a thumb switch to mount on a handlebar. I got a dash rocker switch to replace the handlebar switch. This is every bit as good as a winch costing several times more.
customer_reviews.author: RZR Dad

customer_reviews.title: So far worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Initial review...Took roughly 4 hours to install but no fault of the manufacturer. I had to fabricate a new plate to fit my 2012 Ranger 800. Once installed I did a few small pulls and everything worked fine. The only complaintA at this point is that the quality of the remotes is lacking and confusing installation directions. Wiring was a challenge. Not the clearest instructions . Plus the instructions had several missed spelled words, which I thought was a bit comical lol. Going on a 40 mile ride tomorrow, should find some mud...more to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Installed without a problem and during test all items worked as described. Remotes worked in excess of 30' And, winch handled my SxS without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas in Mi.

customer_reviews.title: Positive First Impression
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and installed today on my trailer. Install was easy and the remotes worked great. Took about 60 minutes to install from start to finish with most of the time drilling the holes I needed. We will see how it hold up but I am very pleased so far..
customer_reviews.author: Peter CaporaleZ

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and works great
customer_reviews.text: Really like this winch. I went with this one because it was cheap and I never really use the winch. But then I’ve been using the hell out of it pulling posts fencing and I use it to do things irrigating a lot now. The remotes are really nice too. I’m very happy with this winch and if it breaks I can buy 2 more for the price Polaris wants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winch for UTV
customer_reviews.text: This winch works great as advertised. Pretty easy to install. Remotes are great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Calzola

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough wire
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up unit , it worked. So I went to bundle wires that came with winch and zip strip them neatly under dash. Well the power wire should be a little heavier duty , when zipped together it started melting.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Used in a toy hauler for loading in and out of the trailer
customer_reviews.text: Like this because of the rope design, heavy duty and I dont have to worry about scratching the floors
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Kills motor on utv when pinching out.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed 2 days ago. Fairly easy to install, however the bolt holes didn't line up on the mount I used. Nothing a little drilling didn't fix. The polarity for the battery terminals was labeled backwards like someone else posted. I got sparks when I connected per instructions. Also when the motor is running on my Polaris 500 if I winch out it l kills the motor. Gonna recheck wiring. Hopefully that'll fix it. Anyone from orcish got any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Bruteforce

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit 2019 Polaris ranger without buying a different mounting bracket. Literally only used it to hold the ranger on a trailer for transport. Worked for 4 times and quit. The remote is (was) super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and so far they work quietly and perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Eric U Know

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for it's size
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! This winch did the job and very easy to install and use. I'm a hot shot trucker and have used this several time with some really heavy loads. This thing was perfect to pull different heavy loads along with the size of it was great. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angely727

customer_reviews.title: Probably Chinese but still Good.
customer_reviews.text: I've had two other brands before this one, and both of them had numerous problems (despite superior customer servvice). This one appears to be of a sounder design than the others and operates quietly, so I'm hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: MILAN BLAHO

customer_reviews.title: Used only once an it broke!
customer_reviews.text: Used once then it didnt work again, very disappointed in this product an i wish i could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Winch won't disengage.can't pull the cable out freely. when I powered it up the control didn't respond very well to release or retrieving the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Wina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pulled a bolder out of the river that was the side of a semi truck tire. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Don't ship with batteries in wireless controllers
customer_reviews.text: The fairlead was to small and both wireless controllers did not work
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: THEY ON TIME SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: that not match for my ATV bracket 2010 Polaris 550 EFI bracket I HAVE LOOK WHAT FIT BRACKET
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Decent winch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Installation was relatively easy. I have installed 3 others previously so that helped some. Instructions were fair. I used a different switch that fit inn dash of my Gator better than the handlebar switch provided. Remote switches seem like they will be handy.
customer_reviews.author: horsedoctor

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating and still works
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable winch for the money. Fit perfectly on my Turbo Rzr and installation wasn’t bad at all. Garbage switch I purchased stuck on the in position, melted power lead and jammed the winch. Repaired the issues and this winch still works. Very impressed and recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: John Squibb

customer_reviews.title: Quality Winch with 2 Nice wireless remotes.
customer_reviews.text: Winch is very well made and with the color coded wiring it was super easy to install. Seems very heavy duty and can’t wait to put it to use. Based on the research I did, For the money this was the best 4500 pound winch that was available.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: very well made for an outstanding price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Contactor is different from other
customer_reviews.author: Richard Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Good product. GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great buy. Everything fit and worked as advertised. Already made useful on an ATV ride. Pulled fast and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clement985

product_meta.title: ORCISH 12V 4500lb Electric ATV UTV Synthetic Rope Winch Kits
product_meta.description:
★Specifications:
◈Rated Line Pull:4500LBS (2041KG) single line
◈Motor:Permanent magnet DC 12V motor with 1.7hp output
◈Gear reduction ratio:166:1
◈Cable length:5.5mm*15m
◈Control:Wire/ Wireless Control
◈Brake:Mechanical brake
◈Fairlead:Hause fairlead
◈Weight:22Lbs
◈Dimensions:350x110x110mm
◈Bolt pattern:124x76mm

★
What's In Box
◈1 x 4500LBS Electric Winch
◈1 x Remote Switch
◈2 x Wireless Remote Control
◈1 x User Manual
◈1 pair of gloves
◈1x 1/4 forged hook
◈1x Hawse fairlead
◈1 set of accessories

★Warranty
◈1 Years Warranty(Winch cable is not included)

★Warning! 
◈Observe safety precautions for personal safety and the safety of others. 
◈Improper equipment operation may cause personal injury and equipment damage
◈Read the following carefully before attempting to operate your winch and 
◈keep the instructions for future reference.
◈If wiring is wrong ,the winch will be short circut,heat or smoking.
◈Any question ,please contact us by email .
feature_bullets: ▶Convenient - Come with high quality TWO wireless remotes
▶Special designed for ATV, UTV, car, boat, trucks, jeeps, modified vehicles and multi purpose utility trailers
▶Steel planetary gears and stainless steel hardware

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
